Hotel Policies

  • As per Government of India’s security regulations, it is mandatory for all guest (including kids) to show a valid photo identification (passport for foreigners) at the time of check-in. Please do ensure to carry this with you.
  • Check-in time : 01:00 PM and Check-out time : 11:00 AM

Guest Policies

  • Smoking / Hookah in the rooms is not allowed.
  • All homestyle meals are served in the dining area during the time stated on the menu.
  • No outside catering is permitted.
  • Guests do not have access to our kitchen and are allowed to cook only in hared kitchen of property.
  • Our property has standardized menu and fully staffed kitchens. In addition, specially curated meals are available for groups with advance notification/planning.
  • We care about your well being, if you have special needs, food allergies etc, please notify us in advance. We can discuss the possibilities to accommodate your dietary requirements.
  • Our last order for food is 10pm, and all staff retire by 11pm. (with the exception of NYE).
  • We provide daily housekeeping service.
  • Following our eco-friendly, water conservation policy – we change our bed linens and towels every two days.
  • Guests are required to adhere to the noise ordinance policy as per individual property.
  • QUIET HOURS begin at 9:30 p.m. disturbing the peace through loud music or drinking, or unruly behaviour is not permitted. The property manager reserves the right to decide what is loud music and caution the guest to reduce sound levels to personal listening levels.
  • Guests are required to wear appropriate casual attire during their stay and behave in a manner that is respectful to other guests, our staff and our property.
  • Not adhering to a decency code on our property or a violation of our policies can result in removal from the property without a refund.
  • We provide another additional service on a chargeable basis like Bonfire (fixed hrs subject to weather permitting),  Bar-be-que dinner, Cake, Candle Light Dinner / set up, Room decoration, etc.

Other Policies

  • Any breakage or damage of any items in the property will be charged as ‘actuals’.
  • Billable items will be deducted from security deposit or additionally billed. These include: Breakage of glassware and crockery.
  • Damage to property, furniture and fixtures, linen, etc. Few chargeable add-ons:
  • Bonfire (fixed hrs.) subject to weather permitting
  • Bar-be-que dinner
  • Cake
  • Candle Light Dinner / set up
  • Room decoration

Prices are available with Sales team and the Property Manager on request.
